docs.lead_paragraph: A state judge said the rule requiring vaccination against the disease for anyone to attend a city-licensed preschool or day care center was invalid without action by the Legislature.

headline.main: New York City’s Flu Shot Mandate for Young Children Is Struck Down
headline.print_headline: Judge Halts City’s Flu-Shot Mandate for Children, Saying It Bypassed Albany

docs.abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Manuel J Mendez rules New York City health department cannot require flu vaccinations of children attending city-licensed preschools and day care centers without action by State Legislature specifying influenza as disease requiring immunization; ruling strikes down one of Bloomberg administration's signature public health initiatives.
docs.snippet: A state judge said the rule requiring vaccination against the disease for anyone to attend a city-licensed preschool or day care center was invalid without action by the Legislature.

docs.lead_paragraph: The two sides agreed to immediately halt fighting as they started discussions mediated by a United Nations special envoy.

headline.main: Yemen Agrees to Cease-Fire With Rebels as Peace Talks Begin
headline.print_headline: Yemen and Rebels Begin Talks Amid Cease-Fire

docs.abstract: Yemeni government and Houthi rebels begin peace talks amid cease-fire; United Nations says that war has left more than 40,000 people dead and caused significant damage to country's infrastructure, deepening its humanitarian crisis.
docs.snippet: The two sides agreed to immediately halt fighting as they started discussions mediated by a United Nations special envoy.

byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim contributed reporting from London, and Shuaib Almosawa from Sana, Yemen.

docs.lead_paragraph: Valeant Pharmaceuticals regained some credibility with upset investors thanks to its announcement Tuesday of a new distribution deal with Walgreens and plans to line up more pharmacies to sell its products after a scandal forced it to cut ties with a key distributor, Philidor.

headline.main: Valeant in New Distribution Deal With Walgreens
headline.print_headline: Valeant in New Distribution Deal With Walgreens

docs.lead_paragraph: The World Health Organisation said on Tuesday that under a U.N.-brokered ceasefire it had begun delivering urgent medical supplies in Yemen, where health services have collapsed leaving many vulnerable to diseases from diabetes to malaria.

headline.main: WHO to Distribute Medical Supplies in Yemen Under Ceasefire
headline.print_headline: WHO to Distribute Medical Supplies in Yemen Under Ceasefire

docs.snippet: The World Health Organisation said on Tuesday that under a U.N.-brokered ceasefire it had begun delivering urgent medical supplies in Yemen, where health services have collapsed leaving many vulnerable to diseases from diabetes to malaria.
